name: ngn-tester
description: Test NGN in different JavaScript runtimes.

scripts.build:test:browser: cd ../build && npm run test:browser && cd ../test && node prepareKarmaBrowserSuite.js
scripts.browser:compatibility: echo 'Building...' && npm run build:browser && echo 'Testing modern browser compatibility...' && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=current BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../.dist/browser/browser-ngn/*.min.js --no-ignore && echo Done.
scripts.browser:compatibility:json: echo 'Building...' && npm run build:browser && echo 'Testing modern browser compatibility...' && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=current BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -f json -c ./.eslintrc ../.dist/browser/browser-ngn/*.min.js --no-ignore > compatibility.json && echo Done.
scripts.browser:compatibility:es6: echo 'Building...' && npm run build:browser && echo 'Testing ES6 browser compatibility...' && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=es6 BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../.dist/browser/browser-ngn-es6/*.min.js --no-ignore && echo Done.
scripts.browser:compatibility:es6:json: echo 'Building...' && npm run build:browser && echo 'Testing ES6 browser compatibility...' && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=es6 BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=./.browserslistrc eslint -f json -c ./.eslintrc ../.dist/browser/browser-ngn-es6/*.min.js --no-ignore > compatibility-es6.json && echo Done.
scripts.node:sanity: npm run build:test:node && tap --no-esm --no-coverage-report -r source-map-support/register -R spec ./*-sanity/**/*-*.js
scripts.node: npm run build:test:node && tap --no-esm --no-coverage-report -r source-map-support/register -R spec ./*-*/**/*-*.js
scripts.browser:sanity: npm run build:test:browser -- --test ./*-sanity/**/*-*.js && pwd && karma start ./karma.conf.cjs
